msItem.colophon: ዘንተ፡ ዘአስተ፡ ጋብአ፡ አቡነ፡ ገብረ፡ ማርያም፡ በበ፡ ንስቲት፡ እምወርኀ፡ መስከረም፨ ለነቢያት፡ እምትንቢቶሙ፨ ወለሐዋርያት፡ እምስብከቶሙ፤ ወለሰማዕት፡ እምስምዖሙ፨ ወለመነኮሳት፡ እምገድሎሙ፤ ይንሥእእዎ፡ ዓሥራት፡ ለኪዳኖሙ፤ ተዝኪሮሙ፡ መድሕን፡ ዘአሰፎሙ፤ ዘገብረ፡ ተዝካሮሙ፤ ወዘጸውዐ፡ ስሞሙ፡ ይሕልፍ፡ በግህደት፡ ምስሌክሙ፡ ዘይቤሎሙ፨ ምስለ፡ ጸሐፊሃ፡ ወተርጓሚሃ፡ ደቂቆሙ።=። አሜን፡
msItem.explicit: ተፈጸመ፡ ወርኀ፡ መስከረም፨ በሰላመ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ። ወበሥምረተ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። እርእስተ፡ ምንባብ፡ ዘወርኀ፡ መስከረም፨ ፹፨ወ፬

msItem.explicit: ጸሎቶሙ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ አቡነ፡ ገብረ፡ ማርያም፡ ወትረ፡ በኵሉ፡ ጊዜ፨ ወልብስ፡ ብርሃን፡ ይኩኖ፡ ዓራዜ፨ አሜን፡ ወአሜን፨ ወአ፡
ተፈጸመ፡ ወርኀ፡ የካቲት፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፨ ወአርእስተ፡ ምንባቡ፡ ፺ወ፩፨
ለዘ፡ ጸሐፎ፡ ወለዘአጽሐፎ፡ አቡነ፡ ገብረ፡ ማርያም፡ ይጽሐፍ፡ ስሞ፡ በቀለመ፡ ጽድቅ፨ ኃበ፡ ዐምደ፡ ወርቅ፨ ዘአስተጋብአ፡ ዘንተ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ በጽሂቅ፨ ተጊሆ፡ በልብ፡ ዕሙቅ፨ ይክፍሎ፡ ቀዊመ፡ በየማነ፡ ሊቅ፨ ምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ደቂቀ፡ ዛቲ፡ ምርፋቅ፨ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨
ወለጸሐፊሃኒ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ወአባሲ፡ ስረዩ፡ ሊተ፡ ለእመቦ፡ ዘገድፍኩ፨

collation.signatures: Quire marks in the upper inner corner of most quires, starting with ፪ for . Due to the quality of the images, the structure of some quires remains unclear. The manuscript is composed mostly of quaternions.

supportDesc.condition: The manuscript shows only minor traces of use: its margins are darkened, the upper margin of the first folia is stained.

layout.note: The manuscript exhibits a significant degree of variation in its layout. The number of ruled lines varies, as does the position of the upper and lower written line (see below). Remarkable is also the position of the vertical pricks: in some sections of the manuscript, they are placed clearly in the margins as is characteristic for patterns I and II according to . In other sections however (e.g. ), the vertical pricks are located much closer to the lower ruled line, thus showing similarity to pattern III in this regard. In some instances, the upper vertical pricks are located close to the upper ruled line, while the lower vertical pricks are clearly located in the margin (e.g. ) The upper vertical pricks are often difficult to discern. In the latter part of the manuscript, all pricks are difficult to discern due to the quality of the images.
layout.ab: Primary pricks are mostly visible, horizontal pricks are mostly visible. On some leaves, horizontal pricks seem to missing, and were possible on the part of the leaves that were cut off.

Horizontal pricks are placed in the margin as typical for Ethiopic manuscripts. There is however significant variation in the position of the vertical pricks: in some sections of the manuscript, they are placed clearly in the margins as is characteristic for patterns I and II according to . In other sections however (e.g. ), the vertical pricks are located much closer to the lower ruled line, thus showing similarity to pattern III in this regard. In some instances, the upper vertical pricks are located close to the upper ruled line, while the lower vertical pricks are clearly located in the margin (e.g. ). The upper vertical pricks are often difficult to discern. In the latter part of the manuscript, all pricks are difficult to discern due to the quality of the images.

The upper line is mostly written above the ruling, the lower line is mostly written above the ruling, but occasionally, the upper line is written below the ruling (e.g. ), and a ruled line has been left empty below the lower written line (e.g. ).

handNote.desc: Trained and regular hand. Several characteristics allow to group this manuscript in Uhlig's period III, probably towards its end: The loops of መ are separated in all orders. ጵ and the numerals ፮ and ፯ have their old form. The form of ፲ with loop is used, e.g. on . The loop of ሎ is mostly attached with a line in the upper part of the body, but also written without the line (e.g. ). The loops of ቶ and ቆ are large. It cannot be excluded that more several very similar hands were involved in the production.

decoNote.desc: Pen-work text dividers consisting of chains of black and red dots or lines are used rarely and irregularly (e.g. ).
Probably bichrome ḥarag at the beginning of the month of Miyāzyā.

Each of these openings contains a totality of six decorative elements, which are symmetrically arranged with each intercolumnar margin containing one decorative element at the top, middle, and bottom (with exception of f. 41r, which only contains one element). The elements on and consist of a kind of vertically mirrored double letter ሐ, marked with dashes above and below and with dots to its right and left. Quite similar are the elements of , where however there is no vertical connector between the upper and lower parts of the elements and the resemblance to the letter ሐ is less pronounced. The elements on , and resemble more common features of Ethiopic manuscripts, the so-called crux ansata and coronis, which are presented here however in peculiar forms, the former resembling a vertically elongated letter የ, marked with dots and dashes above, in the middle and below (, ), and the latter () showing only the spiral marked with dots and dashes above and below, without traces of a crux ansata.
Single decorative element of spiral form in the margins.

item.q:
ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘደብረወርቅ፡ ዘአጥረዮ፡ በንዋዩ፡
ሊቀዲያቆን፡ ባይሞት፡ በሢመተ፡ መምህር፡ ወልደ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ዘሰረቆ፡ ወዘፈሐቆ፡ ወዘአውጽኦ፡ እምዝንቱ፡ ደብር፡ በስልጣነ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ወጳውሎስ፡ ውጉዘለይኩን
አሞንዮስ በዋጀ ጊዜ፡ መሳክርቱ ሶፍያ እደ ክርስቶስ ስእለ ክርስቶስ ገላውድዮስ መጽረ ገነት መልካ ማርያም መድሕኑ ወልደ ጊወርጊስ። ዳዊት በዋጀ ጊዜ።

item.desc: The beginning of the first psalm has been added at the bottom of the page.
item.q:
ብፁዕ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዘኢሖረ፡ በምክረ፡ ረሲዓን፨
ወዘኢቆመ፡ ውስተ፡ ፍኖተ፡ ኃጥአን፨
ወዘኢነበረ፡ ውስተ፡ መንበረ፡ መስተሳልቃን፨

item.desc: The rest of the note has been erased.
Salām-hymn to the monks of Dabra Bizan.
Written in the upper and lower margin of each folio.
Seal, below which ደብረ፡ ወርቅ፡ is written.

div.label: Introduction
div.ab: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩ አምላክ። ንጽሐፍ፡ እንከ፡ ዘንተ፡ መጽሐፈ። ቃለ፡ ኦሪት፡ ወነቢያት፡ እምወንጌል፡ ወእምሐዋርያት፨ እምገድለ፡ ሰማዕት፡ ወመነኮሳት። እምአምርሕት፡ ወድርሳናት፨ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ብሑተ፡ መንግሥት፨ ወበስልጣነ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አቡሁ፡ ፈታኔ፡ ሕቡአት። ወበስልጣነ፡ እግዚኣብሔር፡ ጳራቅሊጦስ፡ ጰረቅሊጦስ፡ መጥበቤ፡ ሕፃናት፨ ወበትንብልናሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ መድኃኒተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ፍጥረት፨ ወበጸውዖተ፡ ስሞሙ፡ ለሚካኤል፡ ወገብርኤል፡ ልቡሳነ፡ እሳት፨ በእንተ፡ ክብሮሙ፡ ለ፳ወ፬ ሊቃናት፨ በእንተ፡ ፬ እንስሳ፡ ጸዋርያነ፡ መንበሩ፡ ለጸባኦት፨ ክሥት፡ ሊተ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ከመ፡ እትናገር፡ ምሥጢራተ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ መጻሕፍት፤ ዘፈታሕከ፡ አፉሁ፡ ለሙሴ፡ መክብበ፡ ነቢያት፨ ዘኢይትነገር፡ ኅቡአ፡ ጥበብከ፡ አይድዐኒ፡ በከመ፡ ይቤ፡ ዳዊት፨ ወእትናገር፡ ስዉራተ፡ ከመ፡ ኢሳይያስ፡ ኢሳዪያስ፡ ወሕዝቅኤል፡ በላዔ፡ መጻሕፍት፨ ወአስትየኒ፡ ከመ፡ ዕዝራ፡ ጽዋዐ፡ አእምሮ፡ ዘሕብረ፡ እሳት፨ ወአንብበኒ፡ ሕቡአተ፡ ከመ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አቡቀለምሲስ፡ ነቢየ፡ ሰብዐ፡ መኃትማት፨ ወምላእ፡ ውስተ፡ ሕሊናየ፡ ዘመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ እሶት፨ ወጠንኩ፡ አንሰ፡ ለፈጽሞቱ፡ ሀበኒ፡ ረድኤተ፨ ወወስከኒ፡ ዓመታተ፡ ሕይወት፨ ለገብርከ፡ ገብረ፡ ማርያም፡ አሜን፨ ኣ፳ወ ለኣብ፡ ራውያን፡

div.label: 12 Maskaram
div.ab: በዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ሠርዑ፡ መምህራነ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ከመ፡ ይግበሩ፡ ለለ፡ ወርኁ፡ አመ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ በዓለ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ እስመ፡ በዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ አሥተርአዮ፡ ለኢሳዪያስ፡ ኢሳይያስ፡ ነቢይ፨ ወውእቱ፡ ተአዛዚ፡ በዲበ፡ ሠናይቱ፡ ለኵሉ፡ ዘመደ፡ እጓለ፡ እመሕያው፨

div.label: 12 Ṭǝqǝmt
div.ab: በዓሉ፡ ለ ሚካኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ዘለለ፡ ወርኁ፨

div.label: 12 Ḫǝdār
div.ab: በዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ በዓሉ፡ ለሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ሚካኤል፡ መልአከ፡ ኃይል፡ ዘያስተምሕር፡ በእንተ፡ ዘመደ፡ እጓለ፡ እመሕያው፡
